ad_text: Elmar Heating & Cooling Sponsored Elmar Heating & Cooling is now hiring an HVAC Lead Installation & Service Technician that is skilled in residential HVAC installations. Candidate should be able to complete and manage mini-split and conventional ducted installations What Can You Expect From This Role? You’ll lead system installations for mainly residential HVAC projects. Projects will be mainly multi-zone & single zone ductless projects and conventional change-outs; You'll produce quality work and will provide exceptional customer service; You’ll work alongside another install technician to carefully execute a plan; You'll be trained to expand both your technical and professional skills and grow professionally and personally What Should You Be Proficient In? Installing Ductless Mini-Splits Installing Heat Pumps and Gas Furnaces Simple Requirements: 3+ Years of HVAC installation experience. Universal CFC Certificate. Valid Driver License / Clean Record. Some Construction Experience. FULL-TIME · LUTHERVILLE, MARYLAND Lead HVAC Installation & Service Technician Apply now
